nodes.text: Jardar was a human male who served as an officer in the fleet of the Rebel Alliance, holding the rank of captain. He commanded the CR90 corvette Candor. He was killed during an attack on the Candor. After his death, Alliance Minister Amilyn Holdo took command of the vessel and succeeded in escaping the attack.
Jardar first appeared in the 2019 canon comic Age of Resistance Special 1.
